data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Michael Fabbri awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Inter close to the penalty box.
Romelu Lukaku (Inter) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 5, Inter have been awarded a corner by Michael Fabbri.
Lautaro Martinez (Inter) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Spezia at Giuseppe Meazza.
In the minute 5, Ardian Ismajli has recovered and rejoins the match in Milan.
The match at Giuseppe Meazza has been interrupted briefly for a check on Ardian Ismajli, who is down injured.
Inter to take a throw-in in Spezia territory.
Inter awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 9, Inter's Ashley Young is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Inter.
Inter's Marcelo Brozovic breaks free at Giuseppe Meazza. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 10, It's a goal kick for the away team in Milan.
Inter awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Milan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 13, Inter attack but Lautaro Martinez's header doesn't find the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Spezia goal kick.
Throw-in for Spezia in their own half.
In the minute 15, Free kick Spezia.
Michael Fabbri signals a free kick to Spezia.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Spezia at Giuseppe Meazza.
Free kick for Spezia in the half of Inter.
Marcelo Brozovic for Inter has been booked by Michael Fabbri and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 19, Spezia's Alessandro Deiola misses with an attempt on goal.
Inter have a goal kick.
Michael Fabbri signals a free kick to Inter.
In the minute 22, Ball safe as Inter is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Spezia have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in Spezia.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Inter in their own half.
Throw-in for Spezia at Giuseppe Meazza.
Michael Fabbri awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 32, Michael Fabbri signals a free kick to Spezia in their own half.
Can Spezia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Inter's half?
Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
In the minute 35, Throw-in Inter.
Romelu Lukaku (Inter) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Michael Fabbri awards Spezia a goal kick.
In the minute 38, Gennaro Acampora of Spezia gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Inter at Giuseppe Meazza.
Free kick for Inter in their own half.
In the minute 40, Spezia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Milan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Michael Fabbri signals a free kick to Inter in their own half.
In the minute 41, At Giuseppe Meazza, M'bala Nzola has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Throw-in for Inter in the half of Spezia.
In the minute 42, Free kick for Inter in the half of Spezia.
Claudio Terzi (Spezia) has received a yellow card from Michael Fabbri.
Roberto Gagliardini is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Ardian Ismajli is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 45, Speziaâ€™s Ardian Ismajli is on his feet again at Giuseppe Meazza.
Roberto Gagliardini returns to the field for Inter after picking up a slight injury.
Michael Fabbri will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Spezia needs to be cautious. Inter have an attacking throw-in.
Inter's Marcelo Brozovic gets in a shot on goal at Giuseppe Meazza. But the effort is unsuccessful.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, Michael Fabbri has blown to start the second-half.
Antonio Conte (Inter) is making a first substitution, with Stefano Sensi replacing Roberto Gagliardini.
Throw-in high up the field for Spezia in Milan.
In the minute 47, Michael Fabbri signals a Inter throw-in in Spezia's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
In the minute 51, Achraf Hakimi scores to make it 1-0 at Giuseppe Meazza.
Lautaro Martinez instrumental with a fine assist.
Michael Fabbri signals a Spezia throw-in in Inter's half.
In the minute 54, Spezia are coming forward and Simone Bastoni gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Inter goal kick.
Lautaro Martinez for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 57, Spezia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Inter awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Michael Fabbri signals a throw-in for Spezia, close to Inter's area.
In the minute 62, Spezia have been awarded a corner by Michael Fabbri.
Corner awarded to Spezia.
In Milan, M'bala Nzola (Spezia) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 63, It's a goal kick for the home team in Milan.
Can Spezia capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Inter's half?
Throw-in for Spezia close to the penalty box.
In the minute 66, Inter make their second substitution with Arturo Vidal replacing Marcelo Brozovic.
Michael Fabbri signals a free kick to Inter in their own half.
Inter have been awarded a corner by Michael Fabbri.
In the minute 69, Can Inter capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Spezia's half?
An attacking Inter player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Romelu Lukaku gives Inter a 2-0 lead from the penalty spot.
In the minute 72, Giulio Maggiore is replacing Luca Mora for Spezia at Giuseppe Meazza.
Vincenzo Italiano is making the team's second substitution at Giuseppe Meazza with Kevin Agudelo replacing Alessandro Deiola.
Ball safe as Spezia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 73, Free kick Inter.
Spezia have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Spezia at Giuseppe Meazza.
In the minute 75, Spezia's Emmanuel Gyasi has run offside.
Inter to take a throw-in in Spezia territory.
Emmanuel Gyasi of Spezia is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 79, Gennaro Acampora for Spezia gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Michael Fabbri awards Inter a goal kick.
Matteo Darmian is on a sub for Ashley Young for Inter.
In the minute 80, The home team replace Achraf Hakimi with Danilo D`Ambrosio.
Ivan Perisic is replacing Romelu Lukaku for the home team.
The away team have replaced Emmanuel Gyasi with Diego Farias. This is the third substitution made today by Vincenzo Italiano.
In the minute 80, Roberto Piccoli is replacing M'bala Nzola for the away team.
Ball safe as Inter is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Spezia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Inter's half?
In the minute 82, Inter awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Spezia in their own half.
Michael Fabbri signals a free kick to Spezia.
In the minute 85, Michael Fabbri signals a Spezia throw-in in Inter's half.
Inter have a goal kick.
In Milan Inter drive forward through Danilo D`Ambrosio. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 88, Can Inter get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spezia's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Spezia in Milan.
In Milan Spezia attack through Matteo Ricci. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Milan.
At Giuseppe Meazza the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Inter to take a throw-in in Spezia territory.
Throw-in for Inter in the half of Spezia.
Throw-in Spezia.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
That's full-time at Giuseppe Meazza. The final score is 2-1.
Spezia make their fifth substitution with Giuseppe Mastinu replacing Gennaro Acampora.
Goal! Roberto Piccoli pulls one back for Spezia to make it 2-1.
That's a fine assist from Simone Bastoni.
